name: 78-Calorie High-Protein Chocolate Chip Cookie Cake
ingredients: ½ cup plain or vanilla non-fat Greek yogurt
1 scoop vanilla casein or whey/casein-blend protein powder
¾ cup granular sugar substitute (e.g. Swerve)
instructions: Mix all wet ingredients in one bowl until smooth
Mix all dry ingredients in another bowl
Combine wet and dry mixtures; stir until even, then fold in chocolate chips
Chill dough in fridge for 15 minutes
Line or grease a round cake pan
Add dough and flatten evenly with damp hands or spatula
Bake 18–22 minutes at 350°F until slightly underdone in the center
Cool 15 minutes, optionally frost, then slice into 10 pieces
